mapper.select: select p.package_code, p.package_name, pi.package_id, pi.package_item_id, pi.package_level, (select dict_text from bas_dict_items where dict_code = 'PACK_LEVEL' and pi.package_level = dict_value) as package_level_name, pi.package_meas, pi.package_unit, pi.is_unpack, pi.is_master, pi.length, pi.width, pi.high, pi.volume, pi.weight, pi.cno, pi.cno_box_num, pi.barcode, (select package_meas from bas_package_items where p.package_id = package_id and is_master = 1 and rownum = 1) as primary_meas from bas_package p inner join bas_package_items pi on p.package_id = pi.package_id where p.is_enable = 1 and pi.is_enable = 1 --@ and p.item_id = #{item_id} order by pi.package_level
